Package com.lmax.solana4j.programs

Class AssociatedTokenMetadataProgram

java.lang.Object
com.lmax.solana4j.programs.AssociatedTokenMetadataProgram
public final class AssociatedTokenMetadataProgram extends Object
Program for managing associated token metadata on the Solana blockchain.

  • Field Details

    • ASSOCIATED_TOKEN_METADATA_PROGRAM_ACCOUNT

      public static final PublicKey ASSOCIATED_TOKEN_METADATA_PROGRAM_ACCOUNT
      The public key for the associated token metadata program account.

      This constant defines the public key associated with the Solana account for the associated token metadata program. It is set to the value returned by Solana.account(byte[]) using the ASSOCIATED_TOKEN_METADATA_PROGRAM_ID.
